twoSetSkill.name: Rebellious Fire 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description: In Herrscher form, a stack granted by the B-pc of this set provides another 15.0% bonus Fire DMG. The host takes 45.0% less Indirect DMG at below 60% HP.

threeSetSkill.name: Everlasting Flames 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Boosts Total DMG by 20.0%. When the host loses HP, her next attack will deal 100% ATK of Fire DMG to surrounding enemies, which on hit boosts her Total DMG by 10.0% for 10s (CD: 2s; triggering it again resets the duration).
